SummaryEnglish: The anime centers on Asahi Kashiwagi, a student who one morning runs into a series of unusual accidents on one morning on the way to school — all in accordance with a vague television fortune he watched that morning, and all culminating with an unfortunate encounter with a girl. Coincidentally, all the girls he meets are new students or teachers at his school. Asahi's prior knowledge of the girls earns him the suspicion of Yoshio, a self-proclaimed "friend of Asahi." After school, he finds a love letter in his shoe locker, telling him to come to the cherry blossom tree behind school, again according to his morning fortune. Asahi heads to the cherry blossom tree to see what awaits him.

1.SummaryEnglish: Asahi Kashiwagi es un chico normal de secundaria que, si sales a la ciudad y miras a tu alrededor, verás a una persona. En el camino a la escuela, sin ninguna duda en la misma vida cotidiana, se encuentran varias desgracias en la mañana. Es como la extraña adivinación que estaba haciendo en el televisor que encendí sin pensar antes de salir. En medio de los problemas que ocurren uno tras otro, la mañana que se puede decir es el peor encuentro con cinco chicas. Agotado física y mentalmente, finalmente llegó a la escuela, donde vio a cinco niñas que habían venido como estudiantes transferidas y nuevas maestras. Fue una mañana en la que desesperadamente escondí mi rostro, pero no había forma de ocultarlo… Por la mañana, Yoshio Ijuin, quien dice ser su mejor amigo de la mañana, pregunta sobre su relación con los cinco. Mientras pasa tiempo con las cinco chicas, descubre que todo es un malentendido y se abre un poco.

1.TitleEnglish: Don't Get So Grabby, You Clumsy Oaf!
1.SummaryEnglish: Some love stories begin after a single, fated encounter on the way to school. Asahi is lucky (or unlucky) enough to have five of them.

2.TitleEnglish: I Figure We All Have Our Own Pleasures and Predilections
2.SummaryEnglish: Asahi’s weird day gets even weirder when he suddenly finds himself the target of multiple romantic advances! It’s official: he has absolutely no idea what’s going on.

3.TitleEnglish: No! Not There! Not Like That!
3.SummaryEnglish: Amelia is an exchange student with a problem: she can’t write the native language.

4.SummaryEnglish: Ilya has a secret Asahi cannot find out about, but how long will it take for the truth to come out? In the end, Ilya has an important decision to make.

5.SummaryEnglish: Bai Mongfa is a beloved teacher, but she has a past that’s about to catch up with her.

6.SummaryEnglish: A strange flying object attacks Asahi, but he’s saved just in time by a magical girl! Unfortunately, this incident is the prelude of a horrible invasion...

7.SummaryEnglish: Although Asahi and the others enjoy the summer seaside to their hearts’ content, something is wrong; so very wrong…

8.TitleEnglish: People Don't Like It If You're Early, But They Hate it If You're Late Too
8.SummaryEnglish: Everything’s different when Asahi wakes up the next morning. Regardless of how he feels, it’s time to face reality.

9.TitleEnglish: Your Mom's Inviting You For Some Baby Roleplay
9.SummaryEnglish: Asahi must decide what happens next.

10.TitleEnglish: Yup, It's Risky to Go in Raw, Rubber
10.SummaryEnglish: Asahi reunites with the others, but they can’t celebrate just yet; a struggle beyond anything they’ve imagined awaits.

11.TitleEnglish: I'm Glad I Got to Meet You
11.SummaryEnglish: Time is in short supply to those who need it the most.

12.TitleEnglish: Could You At Least Put Some Undies On?
12.SummaryEnglish: The price was high, but Asahi has finally reached Aoi. Now, the only thing left is for her to lead him to Ai.
